content.raw: The z value in the pose portion of AtlasBehaviorStepData.msg is used, but there is not a lift_height parameter that I can see.  The lift_height parameter is used when stepping over an object such as a cinder block.  The start and finish z value would be the same.  The swing_height parameter only controls the apex height, not how high the foot is lifted before the swing happens.
content.html: The z value in the pose portion of AtlasBehaviorStepData.msg is used, but there is not a lift_height parameter that I can see. The lift_height parameter is used when stepping over an object such as a cinder block. The start and finish z value would be the same. The swing_height parameter only controls the apex height, not how high the foot is lifted before the swing happens.
